comments.author: Glittering_Shirt5274
comments.body:
Try « Time left ». You have dinner with people you don’t know and who are most of the time new in the city, just like you. 

You can also take salsa classes. Women outnumber men.

comments.author: spritemarkiv
comments.body: Join a choir. The girl to guy ratio is usually 5:1. As a guy it won't matter if you can sing. It's also a great way to meet new friends.

comments.author: MathematicianDry2437
comments.body:
Welcome to Luxembourg! I have come to realize that Adult friendship is tough everywhere and not just in Luxembourg.

What do you enjoy doing for hobbies, that is the easiest way to make friends anywhere. You like to read join a book club, you like to cycle join a cycling club etc 

Also, if you are a Christian, the church is a good place as well to meet people and make friends. 

I like great discussions too. Happy to be messaged , if  you want to hang out and discuss diverse topics over coffee or tea.

comments.author: Artistic-Occasion-55
comments.body: I guess it would mostly depend on what you are interested in ? e.g. what are typical "things" you enjoy sharing with others e.'g music/ concerts, sharing food, nature outings, etc?

comments.author: InspectorJacko859
comments.body: In the choirs I know most of the ladies are over 60... unless there are others...

comments.author: Anxious-Armadillo565
comments.body: And the university choir. They recruit from the general public as well, especially men
